content.text: An Zengaiina is a prisoner on Level 2 of Impel Down.

Zengaiina is a man with fair skin, short light brown hair, tiny black eye irises, hollow sunken black eye baggages, and stitched patterned scar on the upper right side of his forehead. He wears the standard white prisoner outfit with black horizontal stripes, trousers, and white shoes.
Though Zengaiina hated Impel Down, he was too afraid of the Sphinx to leave his cell when Monkey D. Luffy and Buggy tried to break him and his fellow prisoners out.
Not much is known about Zengaiina's abilities, however he is dangerous enough be imprisoned in the great prison although only on the second least secure level.
At some point in his life, Zengaiina was sentenced as a criminal and imprisoned on Level 2 of Impel Down.
He and other prisoners were freed from their shackles and cells by Buggy and Luffy. However, after hearing the roar of the Sphinx, he chose to stay in his cell out of fear.

elements.text: His name is a pun on anzen ga ii na (安全がいいな, anzen ga ii na meaning "safety is good"), referring to his fear of leaving his cell.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 54 Chapter 528 (p. 15) and Episode 425, Zengaiina debuts.
↑  Vivre Card - One Piece Visual Dictionary (Card #0578 (EX Summit War Arc Vol. 5)).
